title: Teady Bear Lyrics Naiyaandi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Teady bear
Movie: Naiyaandi
Singer: Dhanush
Lyrics: Dhanush
Music: M Ghibran		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Teady beara katti urangidum
kutti malar iva paarthaa
manasu oru katingadikudhu pa

athu meera nenacha nenacha
I am very very sorry ..
aalavetti kozhambu vachiruvaa

Konja neram kumari kumari kumari
odamba paarthaa
courier-il fever anupiduvaa

ambulanu aval nerungi nerungi
ponaa, ambulance-il yethi vittuduvaa

takkaru takkaru da topu takkaru da
iva takkunu pudunga
usuru muluka ottura stickeru da

cookeru cokkeru da hot cookeru da
manasa ivala marakka pannudhu
makkaru makkaru da

Son pappadi daa iva pesum pechaal
thaen bottle iva dhegam aachaa

lolli popu thaan iva costume aachaa
kalakuraa mayakuraa
kavidhai coming kavidhai coming

Teady beara katti urangidum
kutti malar iva paarthaa
manasu oru katingadikudhu pa

athu meera nenacha nenacha
I am very very sorry ..
aalavetti kozhambu vachiruvaa

Kaakaavum peacock agum
harmonegal aada weakaagum .. English Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
